availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Mary M. Goodpaster. Father of Elizabeth Goodpaster, William Goodpaster, Charles Goodpaster, Mary Goodpaster, Bettie Goodpaster, and Ella Goodpaster. Farmer in Bath County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County p. 9A
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 10
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 57B
